channel.title: Posts on Shreyas Mayya
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Shreyas Mayya

item.title: Shreyas Strolls
item.description: Over the last couple days, I’ve been trying to get out of the house more by going on a walk every morning. It’s summer, after all; I don’t really have an excuse not to.

item.title: The Humorist
item.description: I’ve been noticing something over the last few weeks – I like to crack jokes. A lot.
